- Deliverables: Reunification plan for Adrian and Dad. A discussion of proposed guidance on co-parenting moving forward. Adjustment to parenting

- How We Use:  I'd like to agree here. Last time we paid for advice not adopted. For that matter, if we don't follow her advice, I'm not totally sure why
we are going back. We did adopt most aspects of it. I disagreed with the overnight on Wednesday.
So I'll be patient as requested for the first issue. Especially since we are trying to make this issue work with OFW. But I'll continue to ask we resolve Dr
Brown before engaging.
These are sensitive matters that have a huge impact on the remains of what is left of the Moyer family. So I hope that was respectful and constructive.
If not, please advise

I cannot sing your praises more loudly. You are demonstrating superhuman partnership capabilities in what could be an explosive and out-of-control
expensive discussion. And you are doing this amid a shitstorm at work. I always told you that you were my Wonder Woman, and even now, you never
cease to amaze me. If I am still allowed to be proud of you, I'm beaming...
